date in readable format, i.e. "January 01, 2018", "11 hours ago UTC", "now UTC" :type date_str: str """ # get epoch value in UTC epoch = datetime.utcfromtimestamp(0).replace(tzinfo=pytz.utc) # parse difference in time return int((d - epoch).total_seconds() * 1000.0)def interval_to_milliseconds(interval): """Convert a Binance interval string to milliseconds :param interval: Binance interval string
